name: audanism
description: An online art piece and experiment striving to create an, in some way, alive and self-aware online audiovisual organism.

scripts.build: browserify src/environment/Audanism.coffee -t [ coffeeify ] -t [ babelify ] -p [ minifyify --uglify --map public/js/audanism.js.map --output public/js/audanism.js.map ] -o public/js/audanism.js --debug
scripts.dev: watchify src/environment/Audanism.coffee -t [ coffeeify ] -t [ babelify ] -p [ sourcemapify ] -o public/js/audanism.js --verbose

author: Alexander Wallin <office@alexanderwallin.com> (http://alexanderwallin.com)
